text: Drenik () is a small settlement in the Municipality of Škofljica in central Slovenia. It lies in the hills east of Pijava Gorica. The entire municipality is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Škofljica municipal site ==References== ==External links== *Drenik on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Škofljica
title: Drenik
